svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

name="第 1 页" id="aUmySg0nQ8L0LXTiOtAY"> <mxGraphModel dx="976" dy="663" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" style="endArrow=open;startArrow=cross;endFill=0;startFill=0;endSize=8;startSize=10;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="144" y="390" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="414" y="390" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-4" value="" style="endArrow=open;startArrow=cross;endFill=0;startFill=0;endSize=8;startSize=10;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="156" y="402" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="156" y="152" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-5" value="t" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="400" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-6" value="xyz" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="160" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-7" value="3维世界只是t=0（常数求导为0），<div>瞬时的一个点</div>" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="90" width="350" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-8" value="" style="shape=waypoint;sketch=0;fillStyle=solid;size=6;pointerEvents=1;points=[];fillColor=none;resizable=0;rotatable=0;perimeter=centerPerimeter;snapToPoint=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="270" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="OWJ9eEkjNh5yY4Rm0J0H-9" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">这里直角是为了方便理解。</font><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">实际上n维叠加是“弯”的</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="410" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
